      • playLottery

        public int playLottery(int number1,
                       int number2,
                       int number3)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        number1 - the first number in the lottery, should be between 1 and 20 inclusive
        number2 - the second number in the lottery, should be between 1 and 20 inclusive
        number3 - the third number in the lottery, should be between 1 and 20 inclusive
        Returns:
        money returns the amount of money returned to the player, will be 0 for loss
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if any 2 numbers passed to it are the same or if any number is below 1 ore greater than 20

      • playScratchcard

        public int playScratchcard()
        Returns:
        returns a value of how much money has been won returns 0 for a loss

      • playOneArmBandit

        public int[] playOneArmBandit()
        Returns:
        returns a array of 4 ints the first 3 of which are ints relating to emoji, the final int is the amount of money won, -price for a loss.
